title.rendered: “IDF Jets Strike Hezbollah Military Targets in Southern Lebanon: An Inside Look at the Recent Interceptions and Counterattacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Fighter jets attacked military buildings of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in southern Lebanon.

Over the past few hours, fighter jets attacked several military buildings of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in southern Lebanon.

Following the alert about the intrusion of an aircraft that was activated in the north of the country a short while ago, air defense warriors successfully intercepted a suspected aerial target that crossed from Lebanese territory. An alert about rocket and missile fire was activated following the launch of the interception. In addition, several launches were identified that crossed from Lebanese territory to the Mount Dov area, IDF forces attacked the sources of fire.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/48GadI8
